roleset.name: (cause to) be confused
roleset.note: ADDLE-V NOTES: Frame created by Arrick (from addle.01-v)

role.descr: confused about or confused with what?

example.name: addle
example.text: The feeling that they were staring at me kind of addled my brain.
example.arg: The feeling that they were staring at me

example.name: Fun example, all args
example.text: Grapefruit you just addled me with what you said; it was amazingly amazing in amazement I am.

example.name: Another with example, a bit more straightforward
example.text: Without exception, they addled me with their questions.
